column1: '''''malta''''' is a noun meaning the metal "gold" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="Names">{{App
column2: Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>

left]]''Malta'' is also the name in Quenya of the eighteenth letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref name="Names"/>  It is the second letter of the fifth grade or [[Tyellë]], which contains "nasal" consonants and it is the fifth letter in the labial or ''p''-series of consonants, the ''[[Parmatéma]]''.  In most modes this letter represents '''M'''.<ref>{{App
column3: Letters}}</ref>  However, in the [[Mode of Beleriand]], ''Malta'' represents '''MM''', a common occurrence in [[Sindarin]].<ref>{{App
column4: Letters}}, footnote 2</ref> The Westron name for this letter is '''''Mí'''''.<ref>See [[Westron Tengwar]]</ref>

column1: The word derives from the [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme
